game.name: Final Upgrade
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Help humanity to spread throughout the cosmos by exploring new worlds, building space factories and setting up trade routes. Research advanced technologies to increase efficiency and unlock new paths of development. Fight off other artificial intelligences in your goal to reach the Final Upgrade!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Help humanity to spread throughout the cosmos by exploring new worlds, building space factories and setting up trade routes. Research advanced technologies to increase efficiency and unlock new paths of development. Fight off other artificial intelligences in your goal to reach the Final Upgrade!

reviewHighlights.text: I expected some automation and gradual buildup, I got "teleport this resource here, okay now teleport this ship here." Game feels... very crude. Like...
I have several issues with the UI but i do recommend it. it's pretty fun
